name: Codename: Ancestors
description:
Codename: Ancestors

This is alpha playtest of Codename: Ancestors, and we are inviting you to try it！

Codename: Ancestors is a primitive society simulation game. After a long migration, the tribespeople came to this land where they could recuperate. You will control the tribespeople to use the knowledge obtained from nature to survive on this land and pass on the knowledge to the younger generation through education to continue the civilization of mankind.

Please Notice:

  1. Since this is an alpha playtest of Codename: Ancestors, you may encounter errors/bugs  in the game. Please screenshot the error message and post it in bug_reports channel in our Discord Server, or leave a comment with the screenshot in the itch.io community.
  2. Players participating in the playtest need to accept that the program automatically collects some of your relevant data, including hardware, error logs, crash logs, parameter logs etc.
  3. The game is still in the development process, the demo may cause inconvenience due to optimization or errors, please understand.
  4. Playtest will be closed and not downloadable after getting enough feedback for closed optimization.

If you are interested in more information of Codename: Ancestors, Please follow my Twitter and join the Discord Server!

Twitter: @WuZhenchen_

Discord: https://discord.gg/wYqwJkQPgs
